con:restMockAction.name: /mashery/v1/reseller/account
/mashery/v1/reseller/shop_cards

con:response.name: Response 1
con:response.con:responseContent:
[{ "id": 3028, "merchant_id": "211-1346844972352-24", "merchant_name": "Foot Locker", "long_description": "

Foot Locker is one of the top athletic footwear and athletic apparel retailers in the U.S. Shop for men's, women's, and kids' athletic shoes and clothing from top brands including Adidas, Nike, Asics, New Era, Puma, Under Armour, and many more! This is a great gift for sports fans, athletes, kids, teens, and adults. A Foot Locker gift card can be used at any Foot Locker, Lady Foot Locker, or Kids Foot Locker location. They have more than 1200 Foot Locker locations in the U.S.

\r\n

A Foot Locker gift card is a perfect gift for athletes and sports fans.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 50.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3750, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-211-1346844972355-64_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-211-1346844972353-0_hd.png" }, { "id": 4264, "merchant_id": "510-1346844985783-90", "merchant_name": "Steak 'n Shake", "long_description": "

For more than 75 years, Steak n' Shake has been selling their infamous steak burgers and milk shakes. Throughout the years, they added more menu items and locations and now have 400 locations in the U.S. They plan on having more than 1500 locations worldwide in the next couple of years! You have the option to dine in or order through the drive-though.

\r\n

A Steak n' Shake gift card is the perfect gift for birthdays and other celebrations.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 250.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 4102, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-510-1346844985787-12_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-510-1346844985785-99_hd.png" }, { "id": 3141, "merchant_id": "330-1346844977754-62", "merchant_name": "Magazines.com", "long_description": "

Magazines.com is the largest publishing agent of discount magazine subscriptions. They have more than 2,000 titles and have everything from animals, photography, auto, business and finance, children, cooking, computers, fashion, heath and fitness, home, music, and more. The most popular titles include: People, Sports Illustrated, Time, Entertainment Weekly, Real Simple, National Geographic, Cooking Light, The Economist and InStyle. Every subscription comes with a 100% money-back guarantee of satisfaction.

\r\n

A Magazines.com gift card is a perfect gift for anyone of any age - especially for those that frequently travel.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 15.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3890, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-330-1346844977757-93_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-330-1346844977756-26_hd.png" }, { "id": 3677, "merchant_id": "442-1348411833042-76", "merchant_name": "Red Robin", "long_description": "

Red Robin is a chain of casual dining restaurants headquartered in Greenwood Village, Colorado and have more than 400 locations across the U.S. Red Robin has been named the #1 best burger by Zagat for four years in a row! You want to know what else is awesome about Red Robin? They give you a free burger for your birthday! Their menu consists of gourmet burgers, shakes, wraps and sandwiches, and yummy desserts. Red Robin is great for the whole family.

\r\n\r\n

Buy a Red Robin gift card for any celebratory occasion. You are bound to have great food and a great time!

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 50.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 4491, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-442-1348411833046-72_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-442-1348411833044-22_hd.png" }, { "id": 3033, "merchant_id": "237-1346844973082-8", "merchant_name": "Grotto", "long_description": "

Head to Grotto's for an authentic Italian meal with family and friends. The lively and unique ambiance will make you feel as though you are in Old Italy. There are locations in Houston, TX, The Woodlands, TX, Galveston, TX, Atlantic City, NJ, and Las Vegas, NV. Head there for happy hour and choose from an extensive wine list or dine in their warm and friendly setting. Their menu features antipasti, specialty entrees, and pastas made from scratch.

\r\n


\r\n

A Grotto gift card is the perfect gift for anyone on any occasion.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 25.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3763, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-237-1346844973085-48_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-237-1346844973084-44_hd.png" }, { "id": 3342, "merchant_id": "538-1346844987158-15", "merchant_name": "Gap", "long_description": "

The Gap is a leading American brand that focuses on clean and classic styles for the whole family. At The Gap, shop clothing, shoes, accessories for men, women, kids, and babies. They continue to aim to help people all over the world express their individual style affordably. They are always improving their jean collection with improved fits, washes, fabrics, and details. They have also built their foundation on creating great-fitting t-shirts and hoodies. The Gap brands include: Gap, GapKids, GapBody, GapMaternity, and babyGap. This gift card can be used at Old Navy, Banana Republic, Athleta, and Piperlime for ultimate flexibility!

\r\n

A Gap gift card is a perfect gift for those with a classic yet trendy style.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 150.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 4146, "terms_and_conditions": "This eGiftCard is issued by and represents an obligation of Direct Consumer Services (DCS). The eGiftCard may be redeemed for merchandise at any Gap brand, Old Navy, Banana Republic or Athleta location, including Outlet and Factory stores. The eGiftCard may also be redeemed online for merchandise at gap.com, oldnavy.com, bananarepublic.com, or athleta.com. If you return merchandise originally purchased with an eGiftCard, any refund will be issued in the form of a plastic gift card issued by DCS which may be used at any of these stores or websites. Any merchandise purchased with an eGiftCard is subject to the applicable store or online return policies. Purchases will be deducted from the amount of this eGiftCard until the value reaches zero. This eGiftCard may not be used or redeemed with certain promotional offers and may not be applied as payment on any account. You may not use an eGiftCard to purchase other eGiftCards. Additional value may be added to this eGiftCard at any Gap, Old Navy or Banana Republic store. Redeemable for cash when the balance is less than $5 or as otherwise required by law. Restricted to use in the USA, Puerto Rico and Canada. By purchasing this eGiftCard, you agree that the laws of the State of California, without regard to principles of conflict of laws, will govern this Agreement. Limit 5 eGiftCards redeemable per online transaction.", "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-538-1346844987161-61_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-538-1346844987160-63_hd.png" }, { "id": 2899, "merchant_id": "105-1346844966714-57", "merchant_name": "Cadillac Bar", "long_description": "

Cadillac Bar has been serving authentic Mexican food in Texas for more than 25 years. They have two locations in Houston, TX and Kemah, TX. In addition to Mexican food, they also have more than 20 types of tequila on hand so you are bound to experience a true fiesta. Some of their most famous guests include George Bush, ZZ Top, Dan Akroyd, Shirley Maclaine, Billy Joel, and Elton John. Drink their world famous margaritas and eat their authentic enchiladas, fajitas, tacos, burritos, and house specials.

\r\n


\r\n

A Cadillac Bar gift card is the perfect for friends and family that love Mexican food and that want to have a fun night out.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 200.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3596, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-105-1346844966714-23_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-105-1346844966714-22_hd.png" }, { "id": 3755, "merchant_id": "23-1346844962984-1", "merchant_name": "AMC Theatres", "long_description": "

AMC Theatres is the second-largest movie theater chain in North America with over 378 locations in the U.S. and Canada. Enjoy a date night out or bring the whole family to the movies to watch the latest Hollywood hits. Each AMC Theatre is stocked with stadium-style seating for prime viewing pleasure. Use your AMC Theatre gift card toward any purchase of food and drink at each location. Stock up on popcorn, candy, soda drinks, and other snacks to maximize your viewing experience. AMC Theatres provides ultimate convenience to its customers by allowing them to search for movies, movie times, and buy tickets online.

\r\n

An AMC Theatre gift card is the perfect gift for any movie-lover or movie goer out there.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 10.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3509, "terms_and_conditions": "Usable up to balance only to buy goods or services at any AMC Theatres, AMC Loews, AMC Showplace, Cineplex Odeon, Magic Johnson and Star theatres in the U.S. Not usable to purchase gift cards. Not redeemable for cash unless required by law. Not a credit or debit card. Safeguard the card. It will not be replaced or replenished if used without authorization. If lost or stolen, replacement card with remaining value requires original proof of purchase. AMC Card Processing Services, Inc. (AMC CPS, Inc) is the card issuer and sole obligor to card owner. AMC CPS, Inc. may delegate its issuer obligations to an assignee, without recourse. If delegated, the assignee, and not AMC CPS, Inc., will be sole obligor to card owner. Purchase, use or acceptance of card constitutes acceptance of these terms. For balance or other customer service inquiries, visit any AMC theatre, log on to amctheatres.com or call 1.800.255.0311.", "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-23-1346844962987-38_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-23-1346844962986-60_hd.png" }, { "id": 4391, "merchant_id": "322-1346844977138-31", "merchant_name": "Louie's Grill & Bar", "long_description": "

Louie's Grill & Bar is a casual place to go to with great American food. They have 15 locations all throughout Oklahoma. You can expect to find classic starters, wraps, soups and salads, burgers, sandwiches, and pizza. During the summer, Louie's has live music on the lake. Louie's Grill & Bar is a great place to go with friends and family.

\r\n

A Louie's Grill & Bar is the perfect gift for anyone that loves a relaxing and fun dining atmosphere.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 15.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3871, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-322-1346844977141-25_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-322-1346844977139-64_hd.png" }, { "id": 3081, "merchant_id": "290-1346844975037-62", "merchant_name": "Kemah Boardwalk", "long_description": "

Kemah Boardwalk has restaurants, shopping centers, midway games, and a train that goes across the entire area. The Boardwalk is located just 20 miles from downtown Houston in Kemah, Texas. They are open daily and offer fun for the whole family. The most popular attractions at the boardwalk are the carousel, the Ferris wheel, and roller coaster. In addition to attractions and dining options, there are several hotels where you can spend the night.

\r\n


\r\n

A Kemah Boardwalk gift card is great for any occasion. Give a gift where they can do it all: dine, eat and play!

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 200.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3823, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-290-1346844975041-69_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-290-1346844975039-70_hd.png" }, { "id": 3753, "merchant_id": "580-1346844989501-22", "merchant_name": "Victoria's Secret", "long_description": "

From sexy little somethings to everyday essentials, plus loungewear, beauty must-haves and more.

\r\n \r\n

Visit VictoriasSecret.com to find a store or shop online!

\r\n \r\n

Also redeemable at Victoria's Secret PINK.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 200.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 4214, "terms_and_conditions": "Please Record this number should you need to request a gift card replacement.\n\nThis Gift Card is issued by Victoria Secret Stores GC, LLC and is redeemable for merchandise only at US and Puerto Rico Victoria's Secret stores, catalogue, and online at VictoriasSecret.com unless otherwise required by applicable law. This card may not be used for payment on any credit card account, to purchase a gift card or toward previously purchased merchandise. If this card is lost, stolen or destroyed, Victoria's Secret may replace it if you provide the card number. Replacement card will be the value of the card at the time Victoria's Secret received your report of loss, theft or unauthorized use. This card carries no expiration date. Associates of Victoria's Secret and its affiliates are not eligible to redeem gift cards at Victoria's Secret Outlet Stores.\n\nTo check your available balance, visit any Victoria's Secret store or call 1-800-270-8999.", "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-580-1346844989504-12_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-580-1346844989502-98_hd.png" }, { "id": 4212, "merchant_id": "64-1346844965202-92", "merchant_name": "Best Buy", "long_description": "

Best Buy is America's number one speciality retailer of consumer electronics, personal computers, appliances, and more. There are over 600+ locations in the U.S. alone and they have stores in Puerto Rico, Mexico, Canada, and China.

\r\n\r\n

When it comes to the most popular tech product or service, Best Buy is sure to have it. Shop online or in-store with your Best Buy gift card. Best Buy carries the hottest brands including Sony, Samsung, Sharp, Lenovo, and many more. Best Buy also offers Geek Squad, their customer support team that will help you with any setup or installation of electronics. They are available 24/7 online, in-store, or by phone.

\r\n\r\n

Also, if you happen to stumble across a product with a lower price at one of their competitor's, Best Buy has a Low Price Guarantee and they will be sure to price match the price.

\r\n\r\n

A Best Buy gift card is the perfect gift for anyone for any occasion.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 20.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3561, "terms_and_conditions": "Legal Disclaimer: \n\nBest Buy does not sponsor, endorse, approve or have any responsibility for this promotion. BEST BUY, the BEST BUY logo and the tag design are trademarks of BBY Solutions, Inc.\n\nTerms and conditions:\n\nRedeemable in any U.S. or Puerto Rico Best Buy retail location or online at BestBuy.com where available for merchandise or services including Magnolia Home Theater and Geek Squad, excluding prepaid open loop cards and items on Marketplace. No expiration date, no fees. Not redeemable for cash. Lost, stolen or damaged cards replaced only with valid proof of purchase to extent of remaining card balance. Not a credit or debit card. Not valid as payment on Best Buy credit card. Check gift card balance at any U.S. or P.R. Best Buy retail location, online at BestBuy.com or call 1-888-716-7994. Must have card number available. Gift card is made of at least 43% recycled content and recyclable by bringing it back to any Best Buy retail location. All terms enforced except where prohibited by law.", "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-64-1346844965205-62_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-64-1346844965204-49_hd.png" }, { "id": 4377, "merchant_id": "127-1346844968504-96", "merchant_name": "Charleston's Restaurant", "long_description": "

Charleston's Restaurant is the perfect mix of casual and upbeat dining. They have locations in Arizona, Indiana, Nebraska, Oklahoma, and Texas. They mostly feature American classics like burgers and sandwiches, salads and soups, chicken and steak meals, and great sides. They also have a gluten-free menu at each of their locations! Each meal is prepared from scratch everyday. At any Charleston's, you are greeted by a friendly staff and you will feel like you are right at home.

\r\n

A Charleston's Restaurant gift card is perfect for any occasion.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 15.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3641, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-127-1346844968507-1_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-127-1346844968505-62_hd.png" }, { "id": 4382, "merchant_id": "127-1346844968504-96", "merchant_name": "Charleston's Restaurant", "long_description": "

Charleston's Restaurant is the perfect mix of casual and upbeat dining. They have locations in Arizona, Indiana, Nebraska, Oklahoma, and Texas. They mostly feature American classics like burgers and sandwiches, salads and soups, chicken and steak meals, and great sides. They also have a gluten-free menu at each of their locations! Each meal is prepared from scratch everyday. At any Charleston's, you are greeted by a friendly staff and you will feel like you are right at home.

\r\n

A Charleston's Restaurant gift card is perfect for any occasion.

", "card_currency_code": "USD", "opening_balance": 45.00, "merchant_card_template_id": 3641, "cover_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants_cards/c-127-1346844968507-1_cover_hd.png", "merchant_icon_image_url_hd": "http://imagestest.gyft.com/merchants/i-127-1346844968505-62_hd.png" }]
